title: Round 2 mock: What we're hearing before the second night of the NBA draft
content: Who are the best players still on the board -- and where could they go? We project the draft's next 29 picks.

title: 'Once in a lifetime': Mavs take Flagg at No. 1
content: The Mavericks selected Duke forward Cooper Flagg with the first pick of the 2025 NBA draft Wednesday night.

title: Suns acquire Hornets' Williams, draft Maluach
content: The Suns acquired Hornets center Mark Williams for the No. 29 pick and a 2029 first-round pick, and then selected center Khaman Maluach with the No. 10 pick.

title: Bailey surprised by Jazz: 'No idea' they'd pick me
content: Rutgers forward Ace Bailey said he had "no idea" the Jazz had interest in taking him with the No. 5 pick, and a source told ESPN that Utah was not among his preferred destinations.

title: Nets use 4 of historic 5 1st-round picks on guards
content: The Nets became the first team in league history to make five selections in the opening round, opting for four guards, including three point guards.

title: Harper goes 2nd, joins Spurs' 'great young core'
content: The Spurs are hoping to have a third straight Rookie of the Year in Rutgers' Dylan Harper, whom they selected with the second pick of the NBA draft.

title: 76ers take Edgecombe; Pels trade up for Queen
content: The Philadelphia 76ers selected 19-year-old guard VJ Edgecombe out of Baylor with the No. 3 pick in the NBA draft.

title: Sources: 84-game NHL season part of CBA talks
content: An increase over the NHL's current 82-game schedule has been discussed internally by the league, and the topic is part of negotiations with the players' union for the new CBA, sources told ESPN.

title: Aces' Wilson leaps Stewart as fastest to 5K points
content: Three-time WNBA MVP A'ja Wilson broke Breanna Stewart's record for fastest to reach 5,000 career points, hitting the milestone in her 238th game Wednesday night against the Sun.

title: üéµ Taylor Swift surprises Tight End Univ. guests
content: Taylor Swift performs "Shake It Off" and walks the red carpet with Travis Kelce at Tight End University.

title: Dirk, Dallas pro teams react to Mavs drafting Flagg at No. 1
content: Congratulations poured in after the Dallas Mavericks made Cooper Flagg the top pick of the 2025 NBA draft.

title: Power Rankings: Mercury overtake Liberty with five-game winning streak
content: Phoenix has bucked speculation over its new-look roster with 11 wins, including over the defending champions.

title: NHL draft buzz: Peterka on the move? Sharks not set at No. 2?

title: 'Championships, fan experience, community': After 20 years as Vikings owners, Wilfs have one last goal
content: The Wilf family built a revered stadium and gets rave reviews from players, but the Vikings have yet to win a Super Bowl.

title: 10 undervalued pass-catchers with intriguing upside or safer floors
content: Matt Bowen lists his favorites with week-winning potential and others who are dependable, despite lower ADPs.

content: MLB's best pitcher has a 1.85 ERA but just a 4-6 record. In the age of analytics, he's not alone. Here's how to fix it.

title: From Man City to Flamengo, why every last-16 team will, won't win Club World Cup
content: We're heading into the knockout rounds of the 2025 Club World Cup as the field of 32 splits in half this week. With updated odds and projections, here's why every remaining team will or won't win this thing.

content: Xabi Alonso called on Real Madrid stars like Vin√≠cius J√∫nior and Kylian Mbapp√© to "improve" their off-the-ball work-rate ahead of the team's final Club World Cup group game with Salzburg.

title: Inter knock out River, advance as group winners
content: Inter Milan scored twice in the last 18 minutes to beat River Plate 2-0 on Wednesday and progress to the knockout stage of the Club World Cup as Group E winners and send the Argentines home.

title: Monterrey into CWC last 16 after Urawa thumping
content: Monterrey advanced to the knockout rounds of the Club World Cup with a thumping 4-0 win over Urawa Red Diamonds at the Rose Bowl on Wednesday, setting up a last 16 meeting with Borussia Dortmund.

title: Messi highest-paid in MLS as Miami sets record
content: Inter Miami forward Lionel Messi is Major League Soccer's highest-paid player for the second year running, with a total guaranteed compensation of $20.45 million, according to data released by the MLS Players Association.

title: Source: Lille make approach to sign LAFC's Giroud
content: Lille have made an approach to sign French striker Olivier Giroud from LAFC, a source confirmed to ESPN's Jeff Carlisle.

title: MLS All Stars led by Messi, loaded with USMNT
content: Inter Miami CF players Lionel Messi and Jordi Alba have been named to the 26-player Major League Soccer All Star roster set to compete against the best of Liga MX at Q2 Stadium in Austin, Texas on July 23.

title: Argentina 2nd tier player, 18, dies during surgery
content: Camilo Nuin, an 18-year-old player for Argentina second division team San Telmo, died on Wednesday during knee surgery.

title: Rodri: It'll be 'months' before I'm back to my best
content: Manchester City midfielder Rodri has said it could be "months" before he finds his best form after nine months out with a knee injury.

title: 'Everything's on the table' for Connor McDavid's NHL future
content: The NHL's best player has one year left on his contract. Will he re-sign, or will he test free agency in 2026?

title: Who makes the Hall of Fame in 2026? Ranking the top candidates
content: Does Patrice Bergeron make it in his first year eligible? What about Keith Tkachuk? Predicting the next class.

title: Inside Bryce Steele's journey back to football after battling cancer
content: After battling cancer in 2023, Boston College linebacker Bryce Steele is set to be a starter this fall.

title: How women's college stars are powering USA Basketball's AmeriCup team
content: LSU's Flau'jae Johnson and TCU's Olivia Miles are among 12 college standouts competing for the U.S. AmeriCup team.

title: Bilas: Eight prospects who stand out in this year's NBA draft class
content: From the no-brainer to the wild cards to those in between, here are eight prospects who caught Jay Bilas' eye.

title: Our one-stop shop for the draft: Mocks, order, big questions and more
content: From teams to watch to our latest mock draft, we have everything you need to know about the 2025 draft.

title: What impact will Cooper Flagg have as a rookie?
content: Andre Snellings looks at what fantasy managers can expect from Cooper Flagg as a rookie this season, and where he should be drafted in leagues.

title: Bradley's take: Will Jake Paul's hook land better than Julio C√©sar Ch√°vez Jr.'s?
content: The question now is not if Paul can beat a real fighter, but if Chavez, a former champion, can go toe-to-toe with Paul.

title: Pound for pound: With Jon Jones walking away, where do the top 10 stand
content: The consensus GOAT has retired, leaving the sport's remaining greats to line up differently in ESPN's rankings.

title: "Bengaluru's Life Very Alluring": Supreme Court Rejects Doctor's Transfer Plea
content: The Supreme Court on Thursday called Bengaluru's cosmopolitan life "very alluring" as it refused to examine a plea by government doctors against their transfers out of the city.

title: Fresh Landslide Blocks New Track To Mata Vaishno Devi Shrine
content: A fresh landslide triggered by rains blocked the new track to Mata Vaishno Devi shrine atop Trikuta hills in the Reasi district of Jammu and Kashmir on Thursday, officials said.

title: French Army Intercepted Iranian Drones Targeting Israel Before Ceasefire
content: France's military took part in efforts to stop Iranian drones targeting Israel prior to this week's ceasefire, the country's defence minister Sebastien Lecornu said late on Wednesday.

title: 10% Drop In Amarnath Yatra Registration After Pahalgam Attack: J&K Lt Governor
content: Jammu and Kashmir Lieutenant Governor Manoj Sinha said on Thursday said there has been a drop of over 10 per cent in pilgrim registration for this year's Amarnath Yatra in the wake of the Pahalgam terror attack.

title: Shubhanshu Shukla Axiom-4 Docking LIVE: Ax-4 To Dock At Space Station Shortly
content: Shubhanshu Shukla Axiom-4 Mission Docking LIVE¬†Updates: SpaceX's Axiom-4 mission, carrying ISRO astronaut Shubhanshu Shukla, is all set to dock at the International Space Station on Thursday.

title: Inflammatory Cells Continues After Severe Asthma Treatment: Study
content: While biological drugs or biologics have improved the lives of many people with severe asthma, a new study shows that some immune cells with high inflammatory potential are not completely eradicated after treatment.

title: US Tightens Visa Rules: Social Media Handles Must Be Disclosed by Applicants
content: Outlining each visa adjudication as a "national security decision", the US has asked applicants to reveal their social media usernames or handles of each platform they have used in the last five years.

title: North Korea May Send More Troops To Russia For Ukraine War: Report
content: North Korea may deploy additional troops to Russia to fight in the war against Ukraine in July or August and Pyongyang is continuing to supply arms to Russia, South Korean lawmakers said on Thursday, citing a briefing by the intelligence agency.

title: Canadian Mayor Urges To Declare Lawrence Bishnoi Gang As Terrorist Organisation
content: Surrey Mayor Brenda Locke has urged the Canadian Federal government to declare the Lawrence Bishnoi gang - and any other groups involved in extortion and violence targeting Canadians of South Asian descent - as terrorist organisations under Canadian

title: Global Drugs Production At 3,708 Tonnes, 34% Jump From 2022: UN
content: Cocaine production, seizures and use all hit record highs in 2023, the UN drug agency said on Thursday, with the illicit drug's market the world's fastest-growing.

title: A Mother-Daughter Love Triangle In Telangana. Then A Marriage And A Murder
content: Aishwarya, the 23-year-old woman arrested after her newly-wed husband Tejeswar's murder, got her neighbour Jagan to install a GPS device on her husband's bike so that he could be tracked and murdered when the opportunity arose, the cops have found.

title: Trump's 2026 Defence Plan: More Drones, Fewer Ships And F-35s
content: US President Donald Trump wants a pay raise for troops, more high-tech missiles and drones in next year's defense budget, while cutting Navy jobs, and buying fewer ships and fighter jets to save money, according to budget materials posted Wednesday.

title: Psychologist Explains Why President Makes Fast, Furious Statements
content: Donald Trumps latest forthright outburst was made as part of his attempts to create a peace deal with Iran and Israel. "Im not happy with Israel," he told reporters on June 24. Trump was furious over the ceasefire violation by Iran and Israel.

title: 'You Own Clothes, Shoes, Phones Because Of Us': BJP MLA's Remarks Spark Row
content: In controversial remarks, Maharashtra BJP MLA Babanrao Lonikar told a gathering that people who criticise his party and government should know they are getting "clothes, shoes, mobile, monetary benefits of schemes and money for sowing because of us".

title: Sean 'Diddy' Combs Confirms He Won't Testify, Then Praises The Trial Judge
content: Sean "Diddy" Combs told the judge during his sex trafficking trial that he was doing an "excellent job", as he confirmed Tuesday that he won't testify.

title: China Hosts Iranian, Russian Ministers Against Backdrop Of 'Momentous Change'
content: China hosted defence ministers from Iran and Russia for a meeting in its eastern seaside city of Qingdao on Thursday against the backdrop of war in the Middle East and a summit of NATO countries in Europe that agreed to boost military spending.

title: Video: Faridabad Cook Slapped 8 Times, Verbally Abused By Employer
content: A female cook was verbally abused and slapped eight times by her employer in Faridabad last week, police said on Thursday.

title: 26 People Arrested In Iran Over Collaborating With Israel: Local Media
content: Iran's intelligence services have arrested 26 people, accusing them of collaborating with Israel, days after a ceasefire between the two countries was announced.

title: Shubhanshu Shukla's Heartfelt Moment With Crewmate Aboard Dragon Capsule
content: Group Captain Shubhanshu Shukla, the second Indian to journey into space after a 41-year gap, shared a brief moment of camaraderie with fellow Axiom Mission 4 (Ax-4) astronaut Tibor Kapu of Hungary during a live broadcast.

title: Where Is Khamenei? Iran's Supreme Leader Missing Amid Ceasefire And Crisis
content: It's been over 24 hours since US President Donald Trump brokered a ceasefire between Israel and Iran, but the disappearance of Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei from public view for nearly a week has raised alarm and widespread concern.

title: Five underappreciated starting pitchers you need to grab now
content: Tristan H. Cockcroft looks at the surprising lack of love for some of the starting pitchers with very strong underlying metrics.

title: What to know ahead of the Austrian Grand Prix
content: Formula 1 heads into round 11 in Spielberg as McLaren's Oscar Piastri remains championship leader - will the Austrian Grand Prix provide any upsets?

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United explore Za√Øre-Emery move
content: Manchester United are looking to make an ambitious move for PSG midfielder Warren Za√Øre-Emery. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: Kerala High Court orders ‚Çπ2-lakh compensation for evicted traders in NH development project
content: High Court, in its judgment on June 11, 2025, directed that compensation be implemented within 12 weeks. The order will be applicable across Kerala

title: Supreme Court issues guidelines for retention, disposal of records
content: In a message, CJI B.R. Gavai said that over the years, the registry of the Supreme Court has witnessed a significant increase in the volume and diversity of administrative records generated across multiple branches

title: Ahmedabad Air India plane crash: Why us? The emotional aftermath of the air crash
content: Psychiatrists in Ahmedabad help families navigate grief stages after the AI-171 crash, offering support amid chaos and despair

title: Former Andhra Pradesh CM Jagan Mohan Reddy‚Äôs quash petition posted by High Court for hearing on June 27
content: The judge observed that perhaps no coercive steps would be taken against petitioner Jagan Mohan Reddy in the meantime

title: Why does the Axiom-4 mission need 28 hours to reach the ISS?
content: To share the ISS‚Äôs lane, the Dragon capsule needs to match both its altitude and its velocity vector. This is achieved using raw speed as well as timing

title: Discussions on restoring statehood to J&K should conclude soon, says CM Omar Abdullah
content: Welcoming the sanctioning of several projects for Jammu and Kashmir, including tunnels, costing ‚Çπ10,600 crore, the Chief Minister said these projects will give a huge boost to the Union Territory.

title: Filmmaker Lijo Jose Pellissery refutes Joju George‚Äôs claim of unpaid remuneration for Churuli
content: In Facebook post, Lijo Jose Pellissery says he decided to come out with an explanation as Joju George‚Äôs comments regarding the film have hurt the producers who are his friends

title: ‚ÄòLanguage is the soul of a nation, not merely a medium of communication,‚Äô says Union Minister Amit Shah
content: Praising Bharatiya Bhasha Anubhag (Indian Languages Section), Mr. Shah said that only Indian languages are used for Centre as well States‚Äô administrative work

title: R.G. Kar doctor rape-murder case: Calcutta HC says trial court to take call on victim's parents' plea to visit crime scene
content: The parents of the murdered R.G. Kar Hospital doctor requested permission to inspect the site of the occurrence of the crime, except the seminar room, where their daughter‚Äôs body was found

title: Will lead PMK for life, says Ramadoss citing Karunanidhi as inspiration
content: Dr. Ramadoss offered praise for Karunanidhi‚Äôs son and incumbent Chief Minister M.K. Stalin, saying he ‚Äúnever raised a voice of protest.‚Äù

title: Navy staffer held for leaking Operation Sindoor details, other classified info to Pakistani handler
content: Inspector General of Police (CID-Security) Vishnu Kant Gupta said Yadav, originally from Rewari in Haryana, leaked the classified information to a female Pakistani handler posing as an Indian woman

title: Ahmedabad Air India plane crash: Data extraction from black boxes, analysis of cockpit voice recorder in progress
content: ‚ÄúThe Crash Protection Module [CPM] from the front black box was safely retrieved, and on 25 June, 2025, the memory module was successfully accessed and its data downloaded at the AAIB Lab,‚Äù the Civil Aviation Ministry said in a statement

title: Acute diarrhoea elimination campaign launched in 1,622 anganwadis in Dharwad
content: Deputy Commissioner of Dharwad Divya Prabhu G.R.J. said that extensive awareness programmes on nutritional food were also being held

title: Airtel says new fraud detection system shielded 3.5 million users in Delhi-NCR
content: Airtel on Thursday said its advanced fraud detection system has protected over 3.5 million users in Delhi-NCR

title: Google vice-president Thota Chandrasekhar donates ‚Çπ1 crore to TTD
content: A cheque for the amount was handed over to the TTD chairman B.R. Naidu at his camp office in Tirumala

title: Kerala rains: IMD issues red alert for three districts as monsoon intensifies
content: Seven districts ‚Äì Pathanamthitta, Kottayam, Ernakulam, Thrissur, Palakkad, Kozhikode and Kannur ‚Äì put on orange alert on Thursday

title: India calls out Pakistan's unwarranted aspersions, attempts to deflect attention from atrocities against children at UN
content: Mr. Harish said that UN Secretary General Antonio Guterres‚Äô report on CAAC provides details of serious violations against children in armed conflict in Pakistan

title: Demolition of Chander Kunj Army towers: Kerala High Court verdict on review petitions silent on tower A
content: District Collector in his capacity as convenor of committee formed at court‚Äôs direction to oversee proposed demolition and reconstruction in Kochi has called for urgent inspection of tower A since it was built by same construction firm that built the other two

title: Kerala CM calls for ward-level vigilance committees to combat synthetic drug abuse
content: Pinarayi Vijayan says synthetic drug abuse continues to be one of the prime reasons for increase in crimes and breakdown of social life of the youth

title: Union government‚Äôs portal for compulsory registration of Waqf properties illegal: Jawahirullah
content: Mr. Jawahirullah said the Waqf Amendment Act, 2025, is under judicial review before the Supreme Court of India

title: PVR INOX moves Madras High Court again challenging proposed closure of multiplex at Chennai airport‚Äôs Aerohub
content: Justice N. Anand Venkatesh decides to take up the new writ petition for final hearing on July 8 and orders maintenance of status quo till then

title: Operation Sindhu: 272 Indians, 3 Nepalese nationals evacuated from Iran
content: India has brought back 594 Indians from Israel, using C-17 heavy-lift aircraft of the Indian Air Force to fly out more than 400 people after they were moved out of Israel to Jordan and Egypt by land transit points

title: Kamakhya temple doors open after four days of 'Ambubachi Mela'
content: The mela is held for four days every year when the temple doors are closed, coinciding with the ritualistic menstrual cycle of Goddess Kamakhya

title: Two killed, 50 injured as double-decker bus overturns on Lucknow-Agra Expressway
content: The accident occurred near the Mandi village when the speeding bus, travelling from Bihar to Delhi, lost control while attempting to overtake a truck

title: CB-CID takes over Tiruvallur teenager abduction case in Tamil Nadu
content: The abduction was allegedly carried out to separate an inter-caste couple, who got married on April 15 this year, amid stiff resistance¬†from the woman‚Äôs parents

title: Can India push Pakistan into FATF‚Äôs ‚ÄòGrey list‚Äô?
content: Islamabad has been in the FATF Grey list thrice since 2008 before it was removed from the list in October 2022

title: Russia assures timely delivery of remaining S-400 air defence system during bilateral meeting with Rajnath
content: An initial order of five S-400s was placed by India and three have been delivered. The remaining two will be delivered soon, Russian Defence Minister Andrey Belousov said

title: SAD workers hold protest over arrest of party leader Bikram Maijithia
content: Action would be taken against those involved in the drug business, says Punjab Minister Harpal Singh Cheema

title: Encounter between terrorists, security forces breaks out in Jammu and Kashmir‚Äôs Udhampur
content: Security forces track and engage four Jaish-e-Mohammad terrorists in Jammu and Kashmir amid rain and fog

title: Navy staffer arrested: Vishal leaked defence info to Pak during Op Sindoor; wanted to repay debts
content: Vishal Yadav, a clerk at the Naval office in New Delhi, has been arrested for allegedly leaking classified defence information to a Pakistani handler. He shared sensitive details, including those related to Op Sindoor, in exchange for money to fund his online gaming addiction. Yadav was apprehended in Jaipur under the Official Secrets Act.

title: 'Even free bird ...': Tharoor‚Äôs cryptic post ruffles Cong, triggers 'vultures' warning
content: Following Shashi Tharoor's cryptic social media post, the Congress party has intensified its criticism of the Thiruvananthapuram MP. Manickam Tagore cautioned Tharoor to be wary of 'hawks' and 'vultures,' while Congress President Mallikarjun Kharge indirectly criticized Tharoor for allegedly prioritizing Modi over the nation.

title: Exclusive: No Magnus Carlsen in India! Freestyle Chess event called off over lack of sponsors
content: The Indian leg of the Freestyle Chess Grand Slam, scheduled for September in New Delhi, has been cancelled due to a lack of sponsors. This is a disappointment for fans hoping to see Magnus Carlsen compete in India. CEO Jan Henric Buettner confirmed the move and will step down in July. The next event is in Las Vegas this July.

title: Taking tough stand: India refuses to sign SCO joint statement as Pak, China go soft on terror
content: Defence Minister Rajnath Singh took a firm stand at the SCO meeting in China. He refused to sign a joint statement due to disagreements on terrorism. Singh condemned the use of terrorism as a state policy, targeting Pakistan. He highlighted the Pahalgam attack and called for collective action against terrorism.

title: Not just iPhones: Android makers boost India-to-US exports amid tariff push
content: Driven by tariffs and government incentives, smartphone exports from India to the US are surging. Motorola, leveraging Indian manufacturing, significantly increased Android phone shipments to the US, capitalizing on tariff advantages over China. Samsung also boosted exports, while Apple remains the largest exporter overall.

title: Sonam & Ishwarya: Two states, two murders, one sinister blueprint
content: In chilling echoes of betrayal, two honeymoon murders have rocked India. In Telangana, a land surveyor was allegedly killed at his wife's lover's behest after she shared his location. Similarly, in Meghalaya, a newlywed was murdered on his honeymoon, with his wife accused of paying her lover to orchestrate the killing.

title: Controversial post: FIR filed against K'taka BJP for comparing Indira Gandhi to Hitler; Cong protests
content: Karnataka BJP faces legal trouble after an FIR was filed over a contentious social media post. The post allegedly likened Indira Gandhi to Adolf Hitler, sparking outrage and a police investigation. The complaint, lodged by a KPCC general secretary, accuses the BJP of defamation and inciting social unrest through the now-deleted content.

title: US Embassy warns: Missing info on visa form can get you rejected; Applicants must list all‚Ä¶
content: The US Embassy in India has cautioned visa seekers to accurately disclose their social media presence. Failing to list all usernames and handles used across various platforms in the last five years on the DS-160 form could result in visa denial and future ineligibility.

title: America‚Äôs China threat: Huawei‚Äôs new laptop fuels debate on US sanctions
content: Huawei's new MateBook Fold uses a SMIC-made 7nm chip, showcasing China's tech self-reliance amid U.S. sanctions. Despite this, China lags behind TSMC's advanced chip technology. U.S. restrictions hinder China's access to cutting-edge chipmaking tools and AI chips, intensifying competition in the tech sector. China is pinning its hopes on Huawei and SMIC for advanced chipmaking.

title: Israel-Palestine: Aussie cricketer Khawaja boycotts media outlet - here's why
content: Usman Khawaja declined a post-game interview with SEN after their controversial dismissal of journalist Peter Lalor for social media posts about Gaza. Khawaja, a vocal advocate for human rights, previously faced restrictions for displaying supportive messages on his shoes. Lalor expressed his gratitude for Khawaja's unwavering support, highlighting the cricketer's principled stance.

title: AI 171 crash: 'Data from front black box downloaded, being analysed,' says govt; probe on
content: The black box data from the Air India Dreamliner crash in Ahmedabad on June 12 is currently being analyzed to determine the cause of the accident. The investigation team, including members from the NTSB, began data extraction on June 24.

title: Not AI-first: Perplexity AI CEO wants Google to rebuild Android; says OS is 'optimised for‚Ä¶‚Äô
content: Perplexity AI CEO Aravind Srinivas suggests Google should rebuild Android, claiming it prioritizes ad revenue over AI-driven user experiences. He argues the current OS structure hinders the development of truly intelligent, proactive AI agents. Srinivas believes fundamental changes are needed, not just added AI features.

title: Hyderabad techie takes car onto railway tracks; trains services halted on route
content: A distressed woman drove her car onto railway tracks near Shankarpally, Telangana, disrupting train services for half an hour. Railway staff apprehended her after she hurled stones with an iron rod. The woman, an IT employee from Lucknow who recently lost her job, was handed over to the police and taken for a medical checkup.

title: IND vs ENG: 'Continues to raise the bar' LSG's Goenka goes all praise for Pant
content: Rishabh Pant has achieved a career-best seventh position in the ICC Test rankings after his remarkable centuries in the first Test against England. He equalled Andy Flower's record as the only wicketkeepers to score two centuries in a single Test. Pant's success is inspiring, especially after his near-fatal car accident in 2022.

title: 'Water won't go anywhere': Union minister Patil reiterates Centre's stand on IWT suspension
content: Union Jal Shakti Minister CR Patil has firmly stated that India's decision to suspend the Indus Waters Treaty (IWT) is in the nation's best interest, dismissing warnings from Pakistan. Patil emphasised that any decision regarding the treaty will prioritize India's benefit, brushing aside remarks made by former Pakistani foreign minister Bilawal Bhutto Zardari as empty threats.

title: UPSC CISF AC (Exe) LDCE 2025 result: Written exam merit list released; download link active
content: The Union Public Service Commission (UPSC) has released the written exam results for the CISF AC (Exe) LDCE 2025, held on April 27. Shortlisted candidates will proceed to the PST, PET, and MST stages. CISF will notify candidates about the next phase. Results can be downloaded from the UPSC website. Final marks will be published after interviews.

title: Honeymoon murder: Pistol, ammo found in Indore nullah; backup plan to kill Raja
content: Shillong police recovered a country-made pistol, magazines, and ammunition purchased by Raj, intended for Raja Raghuvanshi's murder if the initial attempt failed. Acting on a lead, authorities found the weapon in a stream and recovered ‚Çπ50,000 from Shilom James' car. The accused, including Shilom James, Lokendra Tomar, and Balvinder Ahirwar, were flown to Shillong for further investigation and court appearance.

title: 'I can‚Äôt afford to pay': Dwyane Wade‚Äôs wife Gabrielle Union on financial strain
content: Gabrielle Union, wife of Dwyane Wade, discussed her financial strategies at a recent event. She highlighted the need for multiple income streams. Union emphasized managing expenses, including supporting her extended family. She also mentioned dividing expenses with her husband, Dwyane Wade. The couple recently navigated Wade's health challenges. They continue to share updates about their lives with their fans.

title: CBSE's biannual exam plan for Class 10 faces backlash: Educators raise concerns
content: The CBSE‚Äôs decision to introduce biannual Class 10 board exams starting in 2026 has received significant backlash from educators. While the policy aims to reduce student stress, many principals express concerns over the impact on academic calendars, teacher workload, and mental health. They warn that extended exam periods and added responsibilities could lead to burnout for both students and teachers. Alternatives, such as online exams and internal assessments, have been suggested to strike a better balance between flexibility and quality education.

title: Teen collides with semi-truck:17-year-old Michigan-bound Elijah Berman killed
content: Elijah Berman, a 17-year-old defensive lineman from Dayton and recent Eastern Michigan commit, tragically died in a motorcycle accident in Franklin, Ohio. The collision occurred at the ramp from Northbound Interstate 75 to Ohio 123 when his motorcycle collided with a semi-truck. Tributes have poured in from the football community, including a heartfelt statement from Eastern Michigan's head coach.

title: J&K encounter: Four JeM terrorists trapped in Udhampur; op underway
content: Based on specific intelligence, a joint operation named 'Bihali' was initiated by the Indian Army and Jammu Kashmir Police in the Basantgarh area. Contact has been established with terrorists during the operation. The White Knight Corps confirmed that the operation is currently ongoing in the Bihali area.

title: NASA James Webb space telescope: New planet TWA 7b discovered
content: The James Webb Space Telescope has made a groundbreaking discovery. It has found its first new planet named TWA 7b. This planet is the lowest-mass planet ever directly imaged outside our solar system. TWA 7b orbits a young star CE Antliae. Scientists used infrared imaging to spot the planet hiding in a dusty ring.

title: When he speaks, 'Pakistan's PR takes day off': Abhishek Singhvi slams Zohran Mamdani
content: Congress MP Abhishek Manu Singhvi has criticized New York mayoral candidate Zohran Mamdani, echoing concerns from other leaders. This follows Mamdani's Democratic primary win against former mayor Andrew Cuomo, which has solidified his position for the upcoming election. Mamdani's political views, particularly his stance on Palestine and Israel, have drawn strong criticism, including from Donald Trump.

title: Kanpur man organises wife's wedding to lover; gives consent after panchayat
content: In a surprising turn of events in Kanpur Dehat, Yogesh Tiwari facilitated his wife Soni's marriage to her lover, Vikas Dwivedi, after discovering their affair. Soni provided written consent, ending her 15-year marriage. A panchayat was convened, and Yogesh organized the wedding at a local temple, with police and villagers present.

title: Kannappa Twitter review: Early reactions hail Vishnu Manchu‚Äôs performance
content: Vishnu Manchu's pan-India mythological film 'Kannappa,' featuring Akshay Kumar, Prabhas, and Mohanlal, is releasing tomorrow, June 27. Early reviews are highly encouraging, with trade analysts praising its spiritually moving narrative, especially for Lord Shiva devotees. Sumit Kadel highlighted the climax as "spine-chilling" and Vishnu Manchu's performance as career-defining. Rohit Jaiswal lauded the last 40 minutes as spectacular.

title: Is Putin looking to invade other countries? What Trump said
content: Donald Trump acknowledged the challenges posed by Vladimir Putin in resolving the Russia-Ukraine conflict, admitting Putin might have ambitions beyond Ukraine. Trump expressed surprise at Putin's actions, considering him "misguided" and believing he desires a resolution to the ongoing conflict. Despite difficulties with both leaders, Trump maintains his aim to settle the situation.

title: 'Is this a joke?': Former BJP MLA denies 2nd marriage with actor; calls viral wedding a film scene
content: Suresh Rathore, a former BJP MLA, is now denying his marriage to actress Urmila Sanawar, claiming the wedding images are from a film he's producing, despite initially introducing her as his wife. This reversal follows a disciplinary notice from the BJP regarding potential UCC violations, while Sanawar insists the marriage did occur in Nepal.

title: Musk's SpaceX faces legal threat from Mexican president over debris & pollution
content: Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum threatens legal action against SpaceX due to rocket debris and environmental contamination following a Starship explosion at the Starbase site in South Texas. Mexico is assessing potential violations of international laws and environmental impact on Tamaulipas. This dispute highlights rising tensions between Mexico and U.S. tech companies over environmental and sovereignty concerns.

title: Betting big on India! JPMorgan leases space in Mumbai for Rs 1,000 cr
content: JPMorgan has pre-leased 116,210 sq ft in Sumitomo's Bandra-Kurla Complex tower in Mumbai for a decade, potentially extending to 25 years. The deal involves an estimated Rs 1,000 crore rental for the initial term, possibly exceeding Rs 2,500 crore overall. Intended as JPMorgan's India headquarters, the monthly rent is Rs 6.91 crore, with increases every three years.

title: 'Meaningful dialogue': Pakistan PM seeks talks with India; highlights unresolved issues
content: Pakistan's Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif has offered India peace talks. He mentioned this during a call with Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed Bin Salman. Sharif wants dialogue on issues like Jammu and Kashmir, water, trade, and terrorism. India insists talks focus on Pakistan-occupied Kashmir and ending terrorism. Recent tensions followed an attack in Jammu and Kashmir.

title: Pics: Pakistan's Abbas shares photos with Ishan Kishan in England - watch
content: Pakistani seamer Mohammad Abbas and Indian wicket-keeper batter Ishan Kishan, both playing for Nottinghamshire, are winning hearts in the County Championship. Their camaraderie was evident when Kishan caught Lyth's dismissal off Abbas's bowling. Kishan, making his debut, scored a quick 87.

title: China plays hardball! After rare earths, China blocks important shipments to India
content: China has halted specialty fertilizer exports to India, impacting the production of fruits and vegetables, while continuing to supply other nations. This action, attributed to strained diplomatic relations and procedural delays, threatens India's crop yields as 80% of its specialty fertilizer imports originate from China.

title: South Delhi farmhouse heist: Businessman held hostage, robbed of Rs 30 lakh
content: In a shocking incident, Delhi businessman Karan Chopra was held hostage and robbed of over Rs 30 lakh by armed robbers at his Ghitorni farmhouse. The criminals also forced him to his Gurgaon office, stealing more cash. Police have apprehended two suspects and are investigating the possibility of an inside job, focusing on the security guard and past employees.

title: TTP kills Pak army officer who 'captured' Abhinandan; Munir attends funeral
content: A Major from Pakistan's SSG, Moiz Abbas, known for claiming the capture of IAF pilot Abhinandan Varthaman in 2019, was killed in a TTP ambush in Waziristan. The attack resulted in the deaths of over a dozen security personnel. The Pakistan army chief attended Abbas's funeral, while the TTP claimed responsibility, stating videos of the attacks would be released soon.

title: 'Nefarious agenda': India slams Pak at UNSC; says it shelled civilians, supports terror
content: India has strongly rebuked Pakistan at the UNSC, accusing them of exploiting the platform to advance a "nefarious agenda." Ambassador Harish highlighted Pakistan's human rights abuses and cross-border terrorism, citing the Pahalgam attack where 26 tourists were killed. He mentioned Operation Sindoor, India's retaliatory strikes on terrorist infrastructure.

title: Uttarakhand: 2 killed, 8 injured after bus plunges into river; rescue ops on
content: A bus carrying pilgrims for the Char Dham Yatra plunged into the Alaknanda river in Uttarakhand's Rudraprayag district, resulting in two fatalities and eight serious injuries. Nine people are still missing as the bus was swept away by strong currents. Rescue operations are underway, with the Chief Minister closely monitoring the situation and assuring all possible assistance.

title: 'Irrefutable from EC's own data': Cong doubles down on Maha poll fraud charge
content: The Congress party has formally lodged a complaint with the Election Commission (EC), alleging irregularities in the Maharashtra assembly polls. Rahul Gandhi previously raised concerns about "vote theft," citing a significant increase in voters between the Lok Sabha and Vidhan Sabha elections. Congress demands digital voter lists and polling day video footage from Maharashtra and Haryana.

title: Photo: Suryakumar undergoes sports hernia surgery, shares update
content: Indian T20I captain Suryakumar Yadav recently underwent surgery in Munich, Germany, for a sports hernia. Yadav, who last represented India in a T20I series against England in February, shared news of his successful surgery on social media. He expressed optimism about his recovery and eagerness to return to cricket.

title: One Nation, One Poll: JPC to meet July 11; key legal consultations on cards
content: The Joint Parliamentary Committee on ‚ÄòOne Nation, One Poll‚Äô will convene on July 11, 2025, to consult with legal experts and former officials regarding the proposed constitutional reforms. This meeting is part of a broader examination of bills aimed at enabling simultaneous elections to the Lok Sabha and state assemblies.

title: Gold & silver price prediction: Will gold rate test Rs 1 lakh mark soon?
content: Gold and silver price prediction today: Amidst Middle East tensions, gold prices are fluctuating. Experts suggest watching ‚Çπ95,800 as a crucial support for gold, targeting ‚Çπ98,500 and potentially ‚Çπ1,00,000. Silver faces a decline but remains positive overall.

title: Chess: Who is Aarit Kapil, 9-year-old from Delhi, who almost beat Magnus Carlsen
content: Nine-year-old Aarit Kapil from New Delhi achieved a remarkable draw against World No. 1 Magnus Carlsen in an online blitz game during the Early Titled Tuesday competition. Despite time constraints, the fifth standard student maintained a winning position against the five-time world champion.

title: ‚ÄòDaddy‚Äôs home‚Äô: White House leans into viral Nato moment with Trump; shares video
content: The White House embraced the "Daddy" nickname given to President Trump by Nato Secretary General Mark Rutte. The nickname emerged after Trump's comparison of Iran and Israel to fighting schoolchildren, prompting Rutte's playful remark. Trump acknowledged the nickname affectionately, while Rutte's efforts to engage Trump during the Nato summit earned him the title of "Trump Whisperer."

title: Sunjay Kapur‚Äôs wife on blended fam: Priya opens up on inviting Karisma
content: One month before Sunjay Kapur‚Äôs untimely death, his wife Priya Sachdev opened up about her blended family with rare emotional honesty, touching upon her bond with Karisma Kapoor‚Äôs children‚ÄîSamaira and Kiaan‚Äîand how she has never tried to replace their mother. Priya revealed that her and Sunjay‚Äôs little son, Azarias, has become the emotional anchor for the family. As the half-brother to both Safira and Kiaan-Samaira, he helped close the emotional gap between step-siblings.

title: Anbumani accuses DMK government of failing to fulfil promises on PDS reform
content: The DMK, in its manifesto for the 2021 Assembly election, had promised to bring all ration shops under a single administrative department, says Dr. Anbumani

title: Congress devours Mahayuti Govt over serving 'meal in silver plates', asks where is farm loan waiver
content: Vijay Wadettiwar criticises Maharashtra Government for extravagant spending on silver plate meals amid financial crisis and law order issues

title: Seven senior faculty from Sharnbasva University selected for advanced training at IITs under CEEE programme
content: The programme focuses on equipping faculty with modern teaching methods, improving the delivery of core engineering subjects, and enhancing employability among engineering graduates

title: Woman booked for driving car on railway tracks near Shankarpally in Telangana
content: In a video that has gone viral on social media, she was seen speeding away on tracks as railway personnel attempted to stop her

content: Cracks noticed on Thursday after two days of incessant rainfall in Mundakkai and Chooralmala areas where a massive landslide took place in 2024

content: The Ministry of Railways has also decided to introduce measures such as yoga sessions, counselling and periodic health check-ups to address the high-stress nature of the job.

content: The victim, Hilda Monthero, died on the spot. Her son Melvin Monthero (26), believed to be under the influence of drugs, is absconding

content: Strengthening of winds over Arabian Sea has led to some extreme rainfall events close to the ghat regions along eastern side of Kerala

title: Bharat Mata row: Kerala CM notifies Raj Bhavan that it can only display national symbols at Governor‚Äôs functions
content: Pinarayi Vijayan issues communique to Governor‚Äôs office based on Cabinet finding that Constitutional protocol forbids using, displaying, or exhibiting political and religious iconography at events graced by the Governor as de jure head of State

title: Rules published by assembly on hill area governance manipulated, alleges ex-Manipur CM Biren Singh
content: Biren Singh claimed that this change has opened doors for a "rapid and unchecked" increase in the number of villages, many of which might not have existed in the past

content: The veteran astronaut shared his thoughts on the day India returned to space after 41 years, as Group Captain Shubhanshu Shukla from India and three other astronauts set forth on a landmark space odyssey

content: ‚ÄúSecurity forces have been continuing search operations and area domination exercises in the fringe and vulnerable areas across districts,‚Äù police said

content: The ceremony was organised on June 25 by the Inspector General Assam Rifles (South) headquarters in Imphal

title: Poor deprived of their right to dream: Rahul Gandhi flags rising costs of houses
content: Mr. Gandhi shared on his WhatsApp channel a media report which claimed that even for the top 5% of urban families by income in Maharashtra, buying a house in Mumbai would take more than 100 years of savings

title: 'Bloody terrified': Flying anxiety peaks in India after fatal Air India crash
content: Google Trends data shows searches for the term "flying fear" in India hit "peak popularity" a day after the Air India crash, and the phrase was still being widely searched

title: Two women Maoists killed in Narayanpur
content: Since January 2024, more than 400 Maoists¬† have been gunned down by security forces in separate encounters in the State.

title: Teen missing after being swept away by waves at Ezhara Parappally beach in Kerala‚Äôs Kannur
content: Incident occurred when a group of four youths were spending time on the beach, two of whom were caught in the rough seas

title: Kerala rains: Nearly 40 houses inundated in heavy overnight rain in Ernakulam; 2 camps opened
content: Water level rises, crossing the flood warning level in many stations, and showing a rising trend along Periyar river basin

title: Two youths arrested on charge of harassing woman anchor at homestay in Kerala‚Äôs Kasaragod
content: The incident which occurred around midnight on Monday came to light after the woman released a video detailing her ordeal.

title: Energy hub in Chandrapur-Nagpur-Yavatmal can generate 3.4 lakh jobs: report¬†
content: iFOREST released the Just Transition Investment Plan for the CNY region, which accounts for 100% of the state‚Äôs coal production and half its coal-based power

title: Two A.P. policemen en route to Hyderabad killed in Kodad road accident
content: The accident was reported at 4.45 a.m. when the officers were en route to Hyderabad from Vijaywada for an investigation in an Narcotic Drugs and Psychotropic Substances (NDPS) Act case.

title: Ganja cultivation drops in ASR district as farmers shift to sustainable practices
content: A recent aerial survey of 14,870 acres in 327 villages identified ganja cultivation in just 93 acres spread across 158 locations in 38 villages, says DIG Gopinath Jatti

title: Amaravati to host India‚Äôs first Quantum Computing Valley
content: The facility will operate in alignment with the goals of National Quantum Mission, aiming to increase productivity and create wealth through advanced technologies, says  ITE &C Secretary

title: Constitution is supreme, all three wings of democracy work under it: CJI Gavai

content: There have been multiple incidents of landslips along NH-75 that connects Bengaluru and Mangaluru cities

content: The ruling Bharatiya Janata Party leaders reacted sharply and advised Mr. Gehlot to pay attention to the leadership crisis in his own party.

title: Four of a family, including new born died after car fell in a canal in Haldwani
content: The family was on its way back home after getting the new born and the mother discharged from the hospital, police said

content: The CBI which had registered the case in 1978 spent seven years in investigation and trial, resulting in the conviction of Satish Kumar Anand

content: Maharashtra Deputy CM‚Äôs comment came after the delegation of Muslim leaders complained of campaigns against loudspeakers by Kirit Somaiya in several areas of Mumbai, as well as police action on removing the loudspeakers

title: Bombay High Court quashes dowry harassment case, flags misuse of Section 498-A¬†
content: The Aurangabad Bench of the Bombay High Court has quashed criminal proceedings against six members of a family accused of dowry harassment, calling it a ‚Äúclassic example‚Äù of misuse of Section 498-A of the IPC¬†

title: Government clears ‚Çπ417-crore electronics manufacturing cluster in Uttar Pradesh under EMC scheme
content: The cluster will be in Gautam Buddha Nagar, which comprises Noida and Greater Noida and the Funds under Electronics Manufacturing Cluster 2.0 are to be disbursed up to April 2028

title: West Bengal CM Mamata announces new TCS office in New Town, spread over 20 acres

title: Chemotherapy drugs made by Indian firms fail quality tests, shows study
content: A landmark study published on June 26 has reported that about a fifth of cancer drugs tested failed quality tests; 16 of the 17 implicated manufacturers are India-based

title: Bombay High Court questions legal basis of stipend for junior lawyers¬†
content: The High Court was hearing a petition filed by 12 junior advocates seeking a ‚Çπ5,000 monthly stipend during the first three years of legal practice

content: Mr. Choudhary, 57, was among the 275 candidates selected for the 280 available posts in Political Science, under the Scheduled Caste category
